long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate boredom buster - the “I Have Ever” Chrome extension! Say goodbye to dull moments and hello to endless entertainment with this fun and interactive extension. Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be presented with a random “Never Have I Ever” statement to keep things fresh and exciting. Whether you’re taking a break from work or just need a quick pick-me-up, this extension is sure to put a smile on your face.

But that’s not all - the “I Have Never” Chrome extension is also perfect for social gatherings. Get to know your friends on a deeper level by playing this classic party game together. Simply open a new tab and let the fun begin! With an endless supply of “Never Have I Ever” statements at your fingertips, you’ll never run out of things to talk about.

So why wait? Add the “I Have Never” Chrome extension to your browser today and start enjoying all the fun and excitement it has to offer. It’s easy to install and even easier to use - just open a new tab and let the good times roll!
